Reviews.Title: after install make me feel safer
Reviews.Author: tom999
Reviews.Content: I had a broke in not long ago, after that, I did some research for the alarm system, find out the set from oplink can do alarm and monitoring, plus the monthly rate is cheaper than others. so I decided to give it a try.it is easy to install, that is a good thing. and I can check in my house when I at work or on vacation, that make me feel safe.some times just look at the kids play from work make me smile.above are the goods, now the thing need to get improved:1) you need a smartphone to have all this feature, I can't do it from pc, and my wife doesn't has a smartphone.2) the alarm is to quick, as soon as the door opened, it start to siren right away, I heard they will put a delay for the update software, that will make it more user friendly. hope happening soon.well, for now that's all I can think, may keep it updated in the future
